alert.note: Alert for Habersham; Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Habersham, Rabun, southeastern Macon and central Oconee Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Franklin to 10 miles southeast of Hiawassee. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Highlands, Scaly Mountain, Mountain City, Tiger, Dillard, Sky Valley, Tallulah Falls, Salem, Lake Rabun and Lake Burton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
